article.title: Playwright Framework
article.body: MVP for Playwright Automation Framework. Features TypeScript, Page Object Model Design Patter, Custom Fixtures, REST API Testing and Mocking, Schema Validation with Zod, Environment Utilization and CI/CD integration with GitHub Actions

article.title: In today's AI-driven world, Quality Assurance holds more importance than ever.
